name: Life of Jerry
description:
Jerry Selin is a skateboarder. Try to live as Jerry and get on top of the skate industry. Don't waste your days, the boss of skate industry gets stronger every day!

Game is playable on mobile and desktop.

If you want to have offline version, better gesture handling on mobile or better caching (less lag), head to lifeof.jerrysel.in and press your browser's add to home screen button. Progressive web app get's installed and you can now play the game without internet connection.

More info & tips about game here.
